Package project.ss.lang.gu.ipatrans

Interface Summary
ToIPATranscriptor This interface describes the operation which converts a text sequence (in the language for which implementation is provided) into equivalent IPA text.
 

Class Summary
Check  
FileName This class takes input as IPA String and returns the diphone string.
GujToIPAMapper maps a gujararti char to english text or IPA char
GujToIPATranslator The Phonetic translater which converts a Gujarati Text into IPA with the help of GujToIPAMappper
NewEditor This class takes input as sequence of unicode characters and converts it to IPA.
ToIPATranscriptorImpl This class implements the functionality described in the ToIPATrans interface.
